title.narrative: Monitoring Plastic Waste Reduction Strategies to achieve SDGs

description.narrative: A desk-based assignment drawing from existing literature and information about current activities/programmes. Aimed at: • identify and assess different programme/initiatives designed to reduce plastic waste in relation to the use of indicators for monitoring implementation • assess the parameters used for tools and models and associated data collection methodologies for the purpose of tracking plastic waste. • review the indicators and related targets in policies and strategies at international and national levels to assess compatibility with the tools. The project will be supported by a set of semi-structured interviews and a webinar for consultation and engagement, and establish a steering committee with proposed representation from DEFRA, FCDO’s SMEP, University of Leeds, World Bank, and GIZ.
